rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The human case found in Australia is of the same H5N1 strain that has spread rapidly around the world but the ones detected on the farms in Victoria are of the different H7N3 strain.

rationale: 'spread rapidly' describes a trend/speed, not a high-potency impact verb.
statement_text: The human case found in Australia is of the same H5N1 strain that has spread rapidly around the world but the ones detected on the farms in Victoria are of the different H7N3 strain.

rationale: 'has spread rapidly' (moderate verb + intensifier) is paired with 'around the world' (scale).
statement_text: The human case found in Australia is of the same H5N1 strain that has spread rapidly around the world but the ones detected on the farms in Victoria are of the different H7N3 strain.
